data.text: Halli Jerusalem makheiya Pharisee lekkhat le sina Dan ocha ngai'n Jisu diang inhongnga inhongrakel,
“Angsikme nasiamruoi ngai'n upa ngai sinadan kha inmakoi? Inmani'n inbak maklai inkut kha rasumu!”
Jisu'n aleimasang, “Hanchu angtiyame nangni'n Pathian chongpeii juimakchuwa nangni ngai sinadan kha ning ijui?
Ajarchu Pathian in aleiti, ‘Nanu li napa kha khoya thoro,’ halli ‘Nang in nanu li napa diang khomaak nasaam inchu, nang kha innathat sik eii.’ Suok 20:12; Innidan 5:16; Suok 21:17; Levi 20:9
Takkha nangni'n ningti, khachu mi inkhat in anu emakli apa diang santhei lekkhat inei kha, ‘Hiwahi Pathianta ejei ti-inchu,’
ama'n anu emakli apa kaya sik hi arei suokmak. Nangni minchuna kha juinasik ah hiwa lam tiang nangni'n Pathian chongpe kha kaya makchu jei.
Nangni akatha omchan kathongai! Angtuk katuunme nangni jarra Pathian chongkachoipa Isaiah ileirilsuok kha!
‘Pathian in ati, hiwa mi ngai'n, kei hi inmur beiya khoya innatho,
Kei chubei innathohi inmani sik anemna ommak
Halli Jisu'n mipui ngai kha akoiya inmani diang ati, “Rangairu halli jetru!
Ning bai suungnga kaluut khan nangni naminchok mak; khawa neek ah ahong kasuok khan nangni anaminchok.”
Halli siamruoi ngai'n ama diang inheiwa ah inti, “Nang in tuuntak angme niril khan Pharisee ngai malung namintookpi nang nijetmak be?”
Jisu'n aleimasang, “Marwaanna kaom kapa ilingmak thingkuung rakip inlaphuk sik eii.
Inmani sik ngaidon pimaru! Inmani chu mitkacho ngai lamkakei mitkacho kha in eii; mitkacho inkhat in mitkacho kha lam akei inchu inin nireella khurra inta sik eii.” Luk 6:39
Peter in Jisu diang aleiti, “Hiwa chongminkhina hi keini diang narilcheen piro.”
Jisu'n inmani diang aleiti, “Nangni tuun katung aleiilak ngai neek ah lajetmak chu.
Nangni ningmurra kaluut phurrakip kha ningwon suungnga aluut halli ningpum makheiya asuok tihi nangni ninglajetmak be?
Takkha murra hongkasuok kha malungnga inphut eii, halli hiwa ngaihin nangni anaminchok. Matt 12:34
Ajarchu ningmalungnga inphut ah akathamak ngaidonna, mithatna, zool-inthaina, halli aleiilak thamakna katho; inrupmaret, maleisei halli aleiilak karilse ngaihi hongkasuok eii.
Hiwa ngai rakip in nangni naminthiangmak. Takkha inmani iti angnga kut rasuleiya inbak in nangni naminchok mak.”
Khawa munkha Jisu'n aleimathaanna Tyre li Sidon ram koolla aleisi.
Khawa ramma kaom Canaan numeisa inkhat ama diang hongnga, halli akheek ah ati, “David Sapa!” “Kei naminriangro, ocha! Kei kasanu kha raikhuo aluut ah poongtheiya omjei.”
Takkha Jisu'n chongbai inkhat um ama diang leimasang mak. Asiamruoi ngai'n amakoolla inheiwa ah inti, “Ama minsitaro! Ama'n eini nuk anajuiya akheek ah om!”
Jisu'n aleimasang, “Israel keelngam inmang ngai sikbit ah kei innajuo tir eii.”
Halli numeisa inkhat aheiwa ah akekuungnga inbok li, “Ocha, kei nasanro!” ati.
Jisu'n amasang, “Naipang ngai bu an kha leili ui ngai diang pesik hi akatuun emak.”
“Atuun khawa kha, ocha,” numeisanu khan aleimasang, “Takkha ui innum inmapupa bubakna makheiya juokata buramol ngai kha inbak.”
Khawajarra Jisu'n amadiang aleimasang, “Nangchu ngamna kalok numeisa na-eii! angme nimanuom kha nang sik ah inthorase.” Halli khawa phatak khan asanu kha adamjei.
Jisu'n khawamun amathaanna Galilee tuidiil tiang aleisi halli chingtiang akalla alei in-ong.
Mipui katamtak amadiang inleihong, kekakiak, mitkacho, ka-inkhooi, chongkasuokmak halli akana mi lekkhat, Jisu kekuungnga inhongruoi; halli inmani ngai kha ama'n aleimindam.
Khawa khan chongkasuokmak ngai'n chong inril, akeii inkhooi ngai'n indam, kasi theimak ngai'n insi khat-um mitkacho ngai'n inmu hi mipui'n inmu pha; Israel Pathian kha inminpaak.

Jisu'n asiamruoi ngai akoolla akoiya aleiti, “Kei'n hiwa mipui ngaihi kaminriang, ajarchu inmani keile inruoiya nithum kinhong omjei tuunchu inmani bak sik inkhat-um neimujei. Kei'n inmani ngai hi bak-inleiya minsizoot mong, ajarchu inmani'n inntiang insipha phai-inwai inte.”
Siamruoi ngaikhan ama diang inheiti, “Hunmo hiwa neelram hin hiwa mipui ngai sik kahun bu le an joleimin?”
“Waipool angjet nangni ningnei me?” Jisu'n aleirakel.
Khawa jarra Jisu'n mipui ngai neipilla in-ong nasik chong aleipeii.
Khawasuoli ama'n waipool sari le nga aleiya, Pathian aleiminpaak, halli kather khoiya asiamruoi ngaidiang aleipeii; woikhat um asiamruoi ngai'n mipui ngaidiang inleisempi.
Inraya ah inbak halli inleikhop. Khawasuo ah siamruoi ngai'n akaliam seng inkhoomma kokwar sari aleisip.
Numeisa khat-um naipang teelleiya khawa kabak pasal seng lisingmili daam inlei eii.
Khawasuo khanchu Jisu'n mipui ngaikha aleiminsi jei, halli rakuong suungkhan aluut ah Magadan ramtiang aleisijei.
